channel.title: Technical Advisory Group (TAG) Charter on Aurora
channel.description: Recent content in Technical Advisory Group (TAG) Charter on Aurora

item.title: Membership and Attendance Guidelines
item.description: For Aurora TAG to function effectively, it is essential to establish clear membership criteria and attendance expectations.

item.title: Roles and Responsibilities
item.description: For the Aurora TAG (Technical Architecture Group) to operate effectively within the Government of Canada (GoC) and Shared Services Canada (SSC) context, it is essential to clearly define roles and responsibilities.
